name: Patchwork
description: Patchwork is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot who goes by the name of Box. With a blend of classic buttons and a foundry-inspired design for arms and legs, Patchwork stands out amongst its robotic peers. Its screen displays a charming cat motif, adding a touch of whimsy to its overall appearance. To enhance its visual acuity, Patchwork is even equipped with stylish glasses as an added accessory. This extraordinary robot is a proud member of the WebtrES club, where it showcases its exceptional skills and talents.
